title: Rescue Workers Find 2 Coal Miners Alive in Poland; 5 Missing

author: Elizabeth Weise, Adrian Marsh
title: Video shows Google self-driving van being hit by car in Arizona
description: A self-driving van that's part of Google's tests in Arizona was involved in an accident Friday after a car driven by a human swerved and crashed into it.

title: Berkshire Hathaway Annual Meeting 2018: Trade 'Is a Win-Win Situation'
description: Tens of thousands of investors have descended on Omaha Saturday for the annual meeting of Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway. DealBook will be here providing analysis

title: California's Economy Is Now Bigger Than All of the UK
UPDATE: 190000 DTE customers remain without power in metro Detroit
description: After high winds and severe weather across Southeast Michigan on Friday, DTE says that about 190,000 customers in the area are without power. That is as of Saturday at 10:30 a.m.

author: Howard Cohen
title: 'Say a prayer for us all.' Carnival passenger shares her nightmare as water floods deck
description: Carnival Cruise's The Carnival Dream had a deck flood after a break in its fire suppression system on May 3 during a seven-day cruise to the western Caribbean from New Orleans. Passenger Marla DeAnn Haase posted images to Facebook as water poured from ceiling…

author: Kevin D. Williamson
title: Changing the Scouts won't change the differences between boys and girls
description: Is “boy” a dirty word? It is for the Boy Scouts of America, which now wants its premier scouting program to be known as “Scouts BSA,” eliminating the word “boy” and all its problematic, rambunctiou…

author: Bernie Kilkelly
title: New Brews Join Long Island Craft Beer Boom
description: Since New York State created a farm brewery license in 2012, the number of craft breweries on LI more than tripled from 12 to 44 today — 26 of which are farm breweries that use locally grown ingredients.

title: Community reacts to proposed Seattle employee tax
description:
SEATTLE -- For some in Seattle, the possibility of more housing options from the proposed employee tax could be a saving grace; for others, they’re concerned the tax could cost them their livelihood.

author: Hugo Martin
title: Aloha! Southwest Airlines to fly to Hawaii, but no flights from LAX — yet
description: The nation's most popular domestic carrier will fly to Hawaii from San Diego, Sacramento, San Jose and Oakland but not from Los Angeles, Burbank or Ontario.

author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/natalie-kitroeff
title: Jobless Rate Looks Like Old Times, but the Economy Doesn't
description: With unemployment below 4 percent for the first time since 2000, the recovery’s duration is remarkable, but lagging pay remains a riddle.

author: Ryan Dube
title: Argentina Central Bank Boosts Main Rate to 40% in Third Rise in Eight Days
description: Argentina’s central bank unexpectedly raised interest rates for the third time in eight days Friday in an attempt to prop up its faltering currency, as the country finds itself once again battling a financial crisis.

author: Michael Isaac Stein
title: Actors were paid to support Entergy's power plant at New Orleans City Council meetings
description: Dozens of people in orange shirts showed up at meetings to support Entergy's new power plant. But for many of them, it was just an acting gig. They were paid to show up and speak on the company's behalf. The Lens interviewed a few of them and reviewed message…

author: Emily Bary
title: Pandora stock has its best day ever on optimism for turnaround
description: Pandora Media Inc.’s recovery showed signs of momentum when the company reported better-than-expected financial results though listener-hours for the quarter still declined relative to a year earlier.

author: Howard Schneider
title: With no gut punch in view, Fed confident in its inflation footing
description: U.S. Federal Reserve officials claimed a big win in hitting their inflation target this week, confident that they had put a decade of false starts and deflation scares behind them.

title: United apologizes for "concerning incident" involving flight attendant
